page.title: 01Living in our area
page.content: Maple Cross is a village a few m1les from Rickmansworth.The population is medium for its overall size with a housing estate,some of the original houses and quite a large park area with a small wood , swings etc. Living in Maple Cross is ,I suppose, just like living in any village with its Newsagent and the Grocer which sells anything you would want in a week, from food and drink to your everyday toiletries. Before the M25 was built,Maple Cross had long tailbacks during the rush hour and it became very hard to get out onto the A405,but now the new Motorway has opened there is alot less traffic on the main road but the vehicles left travel at well over the speed limit of 40 M.P.H.Now Maple Cross is a much quieter place!
